nodes.text: Eloïse Aurora Mae (born c. 2007) is the daughter of the Star Wars creature concept designer Jake Lunt Davies. Since 2014, many of her drawings were taken by her father to design creatures of the sequel trilogy of the Anthology films. The character of Auromae Iselo from Solo: A Star Wars Story was inspired by one of her drawings and was named by Lucasfilm Story Group's Pablo Hidalgo as an anagram of her name after emailing with her father.
